Name: intro-uk.com goes live with Umbraco and Flash

Content.summary: 'intro-uk.com goes live with Umbraco and Flash' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Umbraco, web maestro, XML, Technology Internet written on 05 August 2006
Content.tags: Umbraco, web maestro, XML, Technology Internet
Content.bodyText:
After several months waiting for approval the Intro website is live.

Umbraco feeds XML to a flash front end build by web maestro Rich Salter. Site design was done internally by Intro.

Believe it or not, despite all of my interest in Umbraco, this is my first site to go live other than my own domain!
